meta_info.name: DV_ORDINAL
meta_info.description: A data type that represents integral score values, e.g. pain, Apgar values, etc, where there is:

functions.name: less_than
functions.meaning: True if this Ordinal value is less than `_other_`.

functions.name: is_strictly_comparable_to
functions.meaning: Test if this Ordinal is strictly comparable to `_other_`.

attributes.name: symbol
attributes.description: Coded textual representation of this value in the enumeration, which may be strings made from  +  symbols, or other enumerations of terms such as  `mild`, `moderate`, `severe`, or even the same number series as the values, e.g. 1, 2, 3.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value in ordered enumeration of values. Any integer value can be used.
